Ability.Name: Racials
Ability.Lua:
local race = UnitRace("player")
if race == "Blood Elf" then if UnitPower("player") < 35 then return true end elseif race == Troll then return false elseif race == Orc then return false elseif race == Worgen then return false elseif race == Dwarf then return false elseif race == Goblin then return false elseif race == Draenei then return false elseif race == Night Elf then return false elseif race == Human then return false elseif race == Undead then return false elseif race == Scourge then return false elseif race == Tauren then return false end
Ability.LuaBefore: if UnitBuffID("player", 13165) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Rapid Fire
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,_,_,_,casttime = GetSpellInfo(77767)
if UnitPower("player") <= 40 and casttime > 1200 and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if UnitBuffID("player", 13165) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Hunter's Mark
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftControlKeyDown() then return false end if UnitDebuffID("target", 1130) == nil and UnitHealthMax("target") >= 200000 then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if UnitBuffID("player", 13165) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Serpent Sting
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftControlKeyDown() then return false end if UnitDebuffID("target", 1978) == nil then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Explosive Shot
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Kill Shot
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") <= 20 then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Black Arrow
Ability.Lua:
local start, dur = GetSpellCooldown(53301)
if UnitDebuffID("target", 3674) == nil and UnitPower("player") > 44 and UnitBuffID("player", 56453) == nil and (start + dur - GetTime()) > 1 then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Arcane Shot
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player") > 70 and UnitBuffID("player", 56453) == nil then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Cobra Shot
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player") < 60 and UnitBuffID("player", 56453) == nil then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if PQR_IsMoving(1) == true and UnitBuffID("player", 13165) ~= nil then CastSpellByID(82661) end

Ability.Name: Racial: Blood Elf
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player") < 35 then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if PQR_IsMoving(1) == true and UnitBuffID("player", 13165) ~= nil then CastSpellByID(82661) end

Ability.Name: Mend Pet
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("pet") and UnitIsDead("pet") == nil and UnitBuffID("pet", 136) == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and 100 * UnitHealth("pet") / UnitHealthMax("pet") < 80 then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if PQR_IsMoving(1) == true and UnitBuffID("player", 13165) ~= nil then CastSpellByID(82661) end

Ability.Name: Tranquilizing Shot
Ability.Lua: local i = 1 local buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) while buff do if (bufftype == "Magic" or buff == "Enrage") and candispel then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) end
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Pause
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977 } local immunity = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",80169) or UnitBuffID("player",77769) or UnitBuffID("player",5384) or UnitInVehicle("player") or UnitIsDead("target") or immunity == 1 or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Misdirection
Ability.Lua: local InParty = GetNumPartyMembers() if InParty > 0 and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then for i = 1, InParty, 1 do local member = "party"..tostring(i) if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and UnitThreatSituation(member,"target") ~= 3 then CastSpellByID("34477") SpellTargetUnit(member) end end end
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Multi Shot
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftControlKeyDown() then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end

Ability.Name: Trap Launcher
Ability.Lua: if IsRightControlKeyDown() and UnitBuffID("player", 77769) == nil then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if UnitBuffID("player", 13165) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Explosive Trap
Ability.Lua: if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(13813))) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end
Ability.LuaBefore: if UnitBuffID("player", 13165) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Extras
Ability.Lua:
-- Avoid sudden death on Ultraxion local fadingtime = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",110070)) if fadingtime and fadingtime - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid Hour of Twilight on Ultraxion, Delete next 3 lines if you are working as tank local channelSpell, _, _, _, _, endTime = UnitCastingInfo("boss1") if channelSpell == GetSpellInfo(109417) and endTime/1000 - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
Ability.LuaBefore: if UnitBuffID("player", 13165) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Raptor Strike
Ability.LuaBefore: if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) then CastSpellByID(13165) end
